content_fields.desc: **Required.** The device ID which is initiating the request.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
**Required.** An opaque identifier for the verification request. Must be unique
with respect to the devices involved.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The verification methods supported by the sender.
content_fields.title: [string]

content_fields.desc:
**Required.** The POSIX timestamp in milliseconds for when the request was made. If
the request is in the future by more than 5 minutes or more than 10
minutes in the past, the message should be ignored by the receiver.
content_fields.title: integer

desc:
Requests a key verification with another user's devices. Typically sent as a
`to-device`_ event.
